name: dfareporting_changeLogs_get
description: Gets one change log by ID.

profileId.description: User profile ID associated with this request.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Describes a change that a user has made to a resource.

$ul: **accountId**: Account ID of the modified object.
**fieldName**: Field name of the object which changed.
**kind**: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "dfareporting#changeLog".
**newValue**: New value of the object field.
**objectId**: ID of the object of this change log. The object could be a campaign, placement, ad, or other type.
**objectType**: Object type of the change log.
**oldValue**: Old value of the object field.
**subaccountId**: Subaccount ID of the modified object.
**transactionId**: Transaction ID of this change log. When a single API call results in many changes, each change will have a separate ID in the change log but will share the same transactionId.
**userProfileId**: ID of the user who modified the object.
**userProfileName**: User profile name of the user who modified the object.
